body:
##evacle's extensions

###about

this repository contains the source code for all of the extensions [evacle](http://evacle.comuv.com) has made. you can download any of the extensions [here](http://evacle.comuv.com/extensions.html).

###extensions inside this repository

[pinner](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/nhjpoicdffokejclclfchgbhfjcmnmic?utm_source=github) - adds a pin tab button so you don't have to right click to pin or unpin.

[close pinned tab](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/jjnlecdojfenkidbfdjejdmajggkegca?utm_source=github) - puts a close tab button in the address bar when you are currently viewing a pinned tab.

[live on](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/oficfgdfeoknbjfhommlpiekdapmnebh?utm_source=github) - keeps chrome from closing when the last tab is closed by creating a pinned tab when there is one tab left.

[undo close](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/jbfommnjldfeijjmfocfeiikcjoaglep?utm_source=github) - allows you to undo closing a tab.

[unload](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/ghmpbhcnklckaophnagmnpdjpeapbghc?utm_source=github) - unload a tab. great for slow computers.

[quick start](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/afbecjdnppbhpkiofpcfeaielocnicmn?utm_source=github) - start chrome with all extenstions disabled, click to enabled some. great for slow computers.

[connection notifier](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/elndfjcidiaccgggfbbbhgnopdkahlnd?utm_source=github) - tells you if you don't have internet connection.

[reload once connected](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/hikodoolakhclnfhgeoaagakbinalahg?utm_source=github) - asks you if you wan't to reload all of your pages once chrome finds internet

[window manager](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/ckpkopgfjkohaiedjhjedlnlllgahpnb?utm_source=github) - lets you manage your windows in the click of a button. comparable to firefox's panorama
tagline: all of the extensions created by evacle
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Evacle-extensions
